Articles.Content: Yay. I did it. My spaceship called ,,Prototype" landed on the mun . In first try! Do somebody want it? I will try to post here also a few photos, and maybe craft of my spaceship. Please tell me do you want it or no. Sorry 4 my english but you know... i am polish. May everyone in the future remember of Neil Amstrong And how to post here some photos? xD

And how to post here some photos? xD
Get a free account at a serivce like imgur.com, upload your screenshots there, and use the links imgur provides in your posts.
im embarrsed D= i've had this game for a few months now and i still haven't landed on the mun without mechjeb

Get a free account at a serivce like imgur.com, upload your screenshots there, and use the links imgur provides in your posts.

You dont need a imagure account to post pics, its in te advanced setings optons, thats where you post a pic

in te advanced setings optons
When we went to the new forum software, everybody got a teeny tiny little allotment of useable attachments space. Just a few images will eat it all up, which is one of the reasons the site moderators advise using imgur.com. It's true you don't need a membership there, but it doesn't cost anything and gives you a few additional handling options.

im embarrsed D= i've had this game for a few months now and i still haven't landed on the mun without mechjeb

dont worry, it isnt that hard. just refine your ideas, and look at other peoples. hell, i only just made it to minmus 4 days ago for the first time!!!

on topic: great work on your first landing!!! now you must explore!!
Congrats on your first landing! Now, your next challenge, if you choose to accept it: Land on Minmus on your first try! (If you haven't already )
